verses.verse: Now it came to pass <WH1961> upon a day, <WH3117> that Jonathan <WH3083> the son <WH1121> of Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the young man <WH5288> that bore <WH5375> his armor, <WH3627> Come, <WH1980> and let us go over <WH5674> to <WH413> the Philistines' <WH6430> garrison, <WH4673> that <WH834> is on the other side. <WH4480> <WH5676> <WH1975> But he told <WH5046> not <WH3808> his father. <WH1>

And Saul <WH7586> tarried <WH3427> in the uttermost part <WH7097> of Gibeah <WH1390> under <WH8478> a pomegranate tree <WH7416> which <WH834> is in Migron: <WH4051> and the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH5973> him were about six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> men; <WH376>

And Ahiah, <WH281> the son <WH1121> of Ahitub, <WH285> Ichabod's <WH350> brother, <WH251> the son <WH1121> of Phinehas, <WH6372> the son <WH1121> of Eli, <WH5941> the LORD's <WH3068> priest <WH3548> in Shiloh, <WH7887> wearing <WH5375> an ephod. <WH646> And the people <WH5971> knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> that <WH3588> Jonathan <WH3083> was gone. <WH1980>

And between <WH996> the passages, <WH4569> by which <WH834> Jonathan <WH3083> sought <WH1245> to go over <WH5674> unto <WH5921> the Philistines' <WH6430> garrison, <WH4673> there was a sharp <WH8127> rock <WH5553> on the one <WH4480> <WH2088> side, <WH4480> <WH5676> and a sharp <WH8127> rock <WH5553> on the other <WH4480> <WH2088> side: <WH4480> <WH5676> and the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Bozez, <WH949> and the name <WH8034> of the other <WH259> Seneh. <WH5573>

The forefront <WH8127> of the one <WH259> was situated <WH4690> northward <WH4480> <WH6828> over against <WH4136> Michmash, <WH4363> and the other <WH259> southward <WH4480> <WH5045> over against <WH4136> Gibeah. <WH1387>

And Jonathan <WH3083> said <WH559> to <WH413> the young man <WH5288> that bore <WH5375> his armor, <WH3627> Come, <WH1980> and let us go over <WH5674> unto <WH413> the garrison <WH4673> of these <WH428> uncircumcised: <WH6189> it may be that <WH194> the LORD <WH3068> will work <WH6213> for us: for <WH3588> there is no <WH369> restraint <WH4622> to the LORD <WH3068> to save <WH3467> by many <WH7227> or <WH176> by few. <WH4592>

And his armorbearer <WH3627> <WH5375> said <WH559> unto him, Do <WH6213> all <WH3605> that <WH834> is in thine heart: <WH3824> turn <WH5186> thee; behold, <WH2009> I am with <WH5973> thee according to thy heart. <WH3824>
Then said <WH559> Jonathan, <WH3083> Behold, <WH2009> we <WH587> will pass over <WH5674> unto <WH413> these men, <WH376> and we will discover ourselves <WH1540> unto <WH413> them.

If <WH518> they say <WH559> thus <WH3541> unto <WH413> us, Tarry <WH1826> until <WH5704> we come <WH5060> to <WH413> you; then we will stand still <WH5975> in our place, <WH8478> and will not <WH3808> go up <WH5927> unto <WH413> them.

But if <WH518> they say <WH559> thus, <WH3541> Come up <WH5927> unto <WH5921> us; then we will go up: <WH5927> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> them into our hand: <WH3027> and this <WH2088> shall be a sign <WH226> unto us.

And both <WH8147> of them discovered themselves <WH1540> unto <WH413> the garrison <WH4673> of the Philistines: <WH6430> and the Philistines <WH6430> said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> the Hebrews <WH5680> come forth <WH3318> out of <WH4480> the holes <WH2356> where <WH834> <WH8033> they had hid themselves. <WH2244>

And the men <WH376> of the garrison <WH4675> answered <WH6030> <WH853> Jonathan <WH3083> and his armorbearer, <WH3627> <WH5375> and said, <WH559> Come up <WH5927> to <WH413> us, and we will show <WH3045> you a thing. <WH1697> And Jonathan <WH3083> said <WH559> unto <WH413> his armorbearer, <WH3627> <WH5375> Come up <WH5927> after <WH310> me: for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of Israel. <WH3478>

And Jonathan <WH3083> climbed up <WH5927> upon <WH5921> his hands <WH3027> and upon <WH5921> his feet, <WH7272> and his armorbearer <WH3627> <WH5375> after <WH310> him: and they fell <WH5307> before <WH6440> Jonathan; <WH3083> and his armorbearer <WH3627> <WH5375> slew <WH4191> after <WH310> him.

And that first <WH7223> slaughter, <WH4347> which <WH834> Jonathan <WH3083> and his armorbearer <WH3627> <WH5375> made, <WH5221> was <WH1961> about twenty <WH6242> men, <WH376> within as it were a half <WH2677> acre <WH4618> of land, <WH7704> which a yoke <WH6776> of oxen might plow.

And there was <WH1961> trembling <WH2731> in the host, <WH4264> in the field, <WH7704> and among all <WH3605> the people: <WH5971> the garrison, <WH4673> and the spoilers, <WH7843> they <WH1992> also <WH1571> trembled, <WH2729> and the earth <WH776> quaked: <WH7264> so it was <WH1961> a very great <WH430> trembling. <WH2731>

And the watchmen <WH6822> of Saul <WH7586> in Gibeah <WH1390> of Benjamin <WH1144> looked; <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> the multitude <WH1995> melted away, <WH4127> and they went <WH1980> on beating down <WH1986> one another.

Then said <WH559> Saul <WH7586> unto the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him, Number <WH6485> now, <WH4994> and see <WH7200> who <WH4310> is gone <WH1980> from <WH4480> <WH5973> us. And when they had numbered, <WH6485> behold, <WH2009> Jonathan <WH3083> and his armorbearer <WH3627> <WH5375> were not <WH369> there.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> unto Ahiah, <WH281> Bring hither <WH5066> the ark <WH727> of God. <WH430> For <WH3588> the ark <WH727> of God <WH430> was <WH1961> at that <WH1931> time <WH3117> with the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> while <WH5704> Saul <WH7586> talked <WH1696> unto <WH413> the priest, <WH3548> that the noise <WH1995> that <WH834> was in the host <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430> went on <WH1980> and increased: <WH1980> <WH7227> and Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the priest, <WH3548> Withdraw <WH622> thine hand. <WH3027>

And Saul <WH7586> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him assembled themselves, <WH2199> and they came <WH935> to <WH5704> the battle: <WH4421> and, behold, <WH2009> every man's <WH376> sword <WH2719> was <WH1961> against his fellow, <WH7453> and there was a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> discomfiture. <WH4103>

Moreover the Hebrews <WH5680> that were <WH1961> with the Philistines <WH6430> before <WH865> that time, <WH8032> which <WH834> went up <WH5927> with <WH5973> them into the camp <WH4264> from the country round about, <WH5439> even they <WH1992> also <WH1571> turned to be <WH1961> with <WH5973> the Israelites <WH3478> that <WH834> were with <WH5973> Saul <WH7586> and Jonathan. <WH3083>

Likewise all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> which had hid themselves <WH2244> in mount <WH2022> Ephraim, <WH669> when they heard <WH8085> that <WH3588> the Philistines <WH6430> fled, <WH5127> even they <WH1992> also <WH1571> followed hard <WH1692> after <WH310> them in the battle. <WH4421>
So the LORD <WH3068> saved <WH3467> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> that <WH1931> day: <WH3117> and the battle <WH4421> passed over <WH5674> unto <WH853> Beth-aven. <WH1007>

And the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> were distressed <WH5065> that <WH1931> day: <WH3117> for Saul <WH7586> had adjured <WH422> <WH853> the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> that <WH834> eateth <WH398> any food <WH3899> until <WH5704> evening, <WH6153> that I may be avenged <WH5358> on mine enemies. <WH4480> <WH341> So none <WH3808> <WH3605> of the people <WH5971> tasted <WH2938> any food. <WH3899>
And all <WH3605> they of the land <WH776> came <WH935> to a wood; <WH3293> and there was <WH1961> honey <WH1706> upon <WH5921> <WH6440> the ground. <WH7704>

And when the people <WH5971> were come <WH935> into <WH413> the wood, <WH3293> behold, <WH2009> the honey <WH1706> dropped; <WH1982> but no <WH369> man put <WH5381> his hand <WH3027> to <WH413> his mouth: <WH6310> for <WH3588> the people <WH5971> feared <WH3372> <WH853> the oath. <WH7621>

But Jonathan <WH3083> heard <WH8085> not <WH3808> when his father <WH1> charged the people with the oath: <WH7650> <WH853> <WH5971> wherefore he put forth <WH7971> <WH853> the end <WH7097> of the rod <WH4294> that <WH834> was in his hand, <WH3027> and dipped <WH2881> it <WH853> in a honeycomb, <WH3295> <WH1706> and put <WH7725> his hand <WH3027> to <WH413> his mouth; <WH6310> and his eyes <WH5869> were enlightened. <WH215>

Then answered <WH6030> one <WH376> of the people, <WH4480> <WH5971> and said, <WH559> Thy father <WH1> straitly charged the people with an oath, <WH7650> <WH7650> <WH853> <WH5971> saying, <WH559> Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> that <WH834> eateth <WH398> any food <WH3899> this day. <WH3117> And the people <WH5971> were faint. <WH5888>

Then said <WH559> Jonathan, <WH3083> My father <WH1> hath troubled <WH5916> <WH853> the land: <WH776> see, <WH7200> I pray you, <WH4994> how <WH3588> mine eyes <WH5869> have been enlightened, <WH215> because <WH3588> I tasted <WH2938> a little <WH4592> of this <WH2088> honey. <WH1706>

How much more, <WH637> <WH3588> if haply <WH3588> <WH3863> the people <WH5971> had eaten freely <WH398> <WH398> today <WH3117> of the spoil <WH4480> <WH7998> of their enemies <WH341> which <WH834> they found? <WH4672> for <WH3588> had there not <WH3808> been now <WH6258> a much greater <WH7235> slaughter <WH4347> among the Philistines? <WH6430>
And they smote <WH5221> the Philistines <WH6430> that <WH1931> day <WH3117> from Michmash <WH4480> <WH4363> to Aijalon: <WH357> and the people <WH5971> were very <WH3966> faint. <WH5888>

And the people <WH5971> flew <WH6213> upon <WH413> the spoil, <WH7998> and took <WH3947> sheep, <WH6629> and oxen, <WH1241> and calves, <WH1121> <WH1241> and slew <WH7819> them on the ground: <WH776> and the people <WH5971> did eat <WH398> them with <WH5921> the blood. <WH1818>

Then they told <WH5046> Saul, <WH7586> saying, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> the people <WH5971> sin <WH2398> against the LORD, <WH3068> in that they eat <WH398> with <WH5921> the blood. <WH1818> And he said, <WH559> Ye have transgressed: <WH898> roll <WH1556> a great <WH1419> stone <WH68> unto <WH413> me this day. <WH3117>

And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> Disperse yourselves <WH6327> among the people, <WH5971> and say <WH559> unto them, Bring me hither <WH5066> <WH413> every man <WH376> his ox, <WH7794> and every man <WH376> his sheep, <WH7716> and slay <WH7819> them here, <WH2088> and eat; <WH398> and sin <WH2398> not <WH3808> against the LORD <WH3068> in eating <WH398> with <WH413> the blood. <WH1818> And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> brought <WH5066> every man <WH376> his ox <WH7794> with <WH3027> him that night, <WH3915> and slew <WH7819> them there. <WH8033>
And Saul <WH7586> built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> unto the LORD: <WH3068> the same was the first <WH2490> altar <WH4196> that he built <WH1129> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> Let us go down <WH3381> after <WH310> the Philistines <WH6430> by night, <WH3915> and spoil <WH962> them until <WH5704> the morning <WH1242> light, <WH216> and let us not <WH3808> leave <WH7604> a man <WH376> of them. And they said, <WH559> Do <WH6213> whatsoever <WH3605> seemeth <WH5869> good <WH2896> unto thee. Then said <WH559> the priest, <WH3548> Let us draw near <WH7126> hither <WH1988> unto <WH413> God. <WH430>

And Saul <WH7586> asked counsel <WH7592> of God, <WH430> Shall I go down <WH3381> after <WH310> the Philistines? <WH6430> wilt thou deliver <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of Israel? <WH3478> But he answered <WH6030> him not <WH3808> that <WH1931> day. <WH3117>

And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> Draw ye near <WH5066> hither, <WH1988> all <WH3605> the chief <WH6438> of the people: <WH5971> and know <WH3045> and see <WH7200> wherein <WH4100> this sin <WH2403> hath been <WH1961> this <WH2063> day. <WH3117>

For, <WH3588> as the LORD <WH3068> liveth, <WH2416> which saveth <WH3467> <WH853> Israel, <WH3478> though <WH3588> <WH518> it be <WH3426> in Jonathan <WH3083> my son, <WH1121> he shall surely die. <WH4191> <WH4191> But there was not a man <WH369> among all <WH4480> <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that answered <WH6030> him.

Then said <WH559> he unto <WH413> all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> Be <WH1961> ye <WH859> on one <WH259> side, <WH5676> and I <WH589> and Jonathan <WH3083> my son <WH1121> will be <WH1961> on the other <WH259> side. <WH5676> And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Saul, <WH7586> Do <WH6213> what seemeth <WH5869> good <WH2896> unto thee.

Therefore Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> Give <WH3051> a perfect <WH8549> lot. And Saul <WH7586> and Jonathan <WH3083> were taken: <WH3920> but the people <WH5971> escaped. <WH3318>
And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> Cast <WH5307> lots between <WH996> me and Jonathan <WH3083> my son. <WH1121> And Jonathan <WH3083> was taken. <WH3920>

Then Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to <WH413> Jonathan, <WH3083> Tell <WH5046> me what <WH4100> thou hast done. <WH6213> And Jonathan <WH3083> told <WH5046> him, and said, <WH559> I did but taste <WH2938> <WH2938> a little <WH4592> honey <WH1706> with the end <WH7097> of the rod <WH4294> that <WH834> was in mine hand, <WH3027> and, lo, <WH2009> I must die. <WH4191>
And Saul <WH7586> answered, <WH559> God <WH430> do <WH6213> so <WH3541> and more <WH3254> also: <WH3541> for <WH3588> thou shalt surely die, <WH4191> <WH4191> Jonathan. <WH3083>

And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Saul, <WH7586> Shall Jonathan <WH3083> die, <WH4191> who <WH834> hath wrought <WH6213> this <WH2063> great <WH1419> salvation <WH3444> in Israel? <WH3478> God forbid: <WH2486> as the LORD <WH3068> liveth, <WH2416> there shall not <WH518> one hair <WH4480> <WH8185> of his head <WH7218> fall <WH5307> to the ground; <WH776> for <WH3588> he hath wrought <WH6213> with <WH5973> God <WH430> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117> So the people <WH5971> rescued <WH6299> <WH853> Jonathan, <WH3083> that he died <WH4191> not. <WH3808>
Then Saul <WH7586> went up <WH5927> from following <WH4480> <WH310> the Philistines: <WH6430> and the Philistines <WH6430> went <WH1980> to their own place. <WH4725>

So Saul <WH7586> took <WH3920> the kingdom <WH4410> over <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478> and fought <WH3898> against all <WH3605> his enemies <WH341> on every side, <WH5439> against Moab, <WH4124> and against the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> and against Edom, <WH123> and against the kings <WH4428> of Zobah, <WH6678> and against the Philistines: <WH6430> and whithersoever <WH3605> <WH834> he turned <WH6437> himself, he vexed <WH7561> them.

And he gathered <WH6213> a host, <WH2428> and smote <WH5221> <WH853> the Amalekites, <WH6002> and delivered <WH5337> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> out of the hands <WH4480> <WH3027> of them that spoiled <WH8154> them.

Now the sons <WH1121> of Saul <WH7586> were <WH1961> Jonathan, <WH3083> and Ishui, <WH3440> and Melchi-shua: <WH4444> and the names <WH8034> of his two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323> were these; the name <WH8034> of the firstborn <WH1067> Merab, <WH4764> and the name <WH8034> of the younger <WH6996> Michal: <WH4324>

And the name <WH8034> of Saul's <WH7586> wife <WH802> was Ahinoam, <WH293> the daughter <WH1323> of Ahimaaz: <WH290> and the name <WH8034> of the captain <WH8269> of his host <WH6635> was Abner, <WH74> the son <WH1121> of Ner, <WH5369> Saul's <WH7586> uncle. <WH1730>
And Kish <WH7027> was the father <WH1> of Saul; <WH7586> and Ner <WH5369> the father <WH1> of Abner <WH74> was the son <WH1121> of Abiel. <WH22>

And there was <WH1961> sore <WH2389> war <WH4421> against <WH5921> the Philistines <WH6430> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Saul: <WH7586> and when Saul <WH7586> saw <WH7200> any <WH3605> strong <WH1368> man, <WH376> or any <WH3605> valiant <WH2428> man, <WH1121> he took <WH622> him unto <WH413> him.
